title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You have the power to control the intensity of a clash of styles with a companion or partner today. For example, a roommate might adore a new paint color for the kitchen yet you despise it. But whatever you do, dont let your opinions influence your feelings. The tense opposition between decorous Venus and offbeat Uranus suggests that you can find a suitable compromise by selecting a shade unexpected by either one of you. In other words, a conflict can lead to something unpredictably new and wonderful if you stop digging in your heels for your preference. Focus on your common ground and celebrate your diversity. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
